Write protection for DIS_ICACHE DIS_DCACHE DIS_DOWNLOAD_ICACHE DIS_DOWNLOAD_DCACHE DIS_FORCE_DOWNLOAD DIS_USB DIS_CAN DIS_BOOT_REMAP SOFT_DIS_JTAG HARD_DIS_JTAG DIS_DOWNLOAD_MANUAL_ENCRYPT
Write protection for VDD_SPI_XPD VDD_SPI_TIEH VDD_SPI_FORCE VDD_SPI_INIT VDD_SPI_DCAP WDT_DELAY_SEL

Write protection for FLASH_TPUW DIS_DOWNLOAD_MODE DIS_LEGACY_SPI_BOOT UART_PRINT_CHANNEL DIS_TINY_BASIC DIS_USB_DOWNLOAD_MODE ENABLE_SECURITY_DOWNLOAD UART_PRINT_CONTROL PIN_POWER_SELECTION FLASH_TYPE FORCE_SEND_RESUME SECURE_VERSION
Disable Icache in download mode include boot_mode 0 1 2 3 6 7
Disable Dcache in download mode include boot_mode 0 1 2 3 6 7
Disable force chip go to download mode function
Disable boot from RAM. REMAP means RAM space can be mapped to ROM space. this signal will disable this function
Software disable jtag jtag can be activated again by hmac module
Hardware disable jtag permanently disable jtag function

column6: other than SPI/Legacy SPI boot mode

|comment #: VDD_SPI regulator tie high to vdda
Force using eFuse configuration of VDD_SPI
Select RTC WDT time out threshold
SPI boot encrypt decrypt enable. odd number 1 enable. even number 1 disable
Enable revoke first secure boot key
Enable revoke second secure boot key
Enable revoke third secure boot key
Flash wait time after power up. (unit is ms). When value is 15. the time is 30 ms
Disble download mode include boot_mode[3:0] is 0 1 2 3 6 7
Disable tiny basic console in ROM
b00:force print. b01:control by GPIO46 - low level print. b10:control by GPIO46 - high level print. b11:force disable print.
GPIO33-GPIO37 power supply selection in ROM code. 0:VDD3P3_CPU. 1:VDD_SPI.
Connected Flash interface type. 0: 4 data line. 1: 8 data line
Force ROM code to send a resume command during SPI boot
